newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean state TV says defector on way to S.Korea.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean state TV says defector on way to S.Korea.

text.p: An aircraft carrying Hwang Jang-yop, the most senior official ever to flee North Korea, is on its way to South Korea from the Philippines, South Korean state television reported on Sunday.
Earlier, officials in the Philippines refused to say if Hwang was aboard a chartered flight that left Manila for South Korea on a confidential mission.
The officials said Pyongyang could intercept the plane any time.
Soldiers shooed reporters away just before the Boeing 737 took off at 7 a.m. local time (2300 gmt Saturday) from Manila's military air base carrying several unidentified passengers.
Hwang defected in Beijing on February 12 and has been in the Philippines since March 18, but his whereabouts have been kept a tight secret.
